item.description:
Please com join Japanese Association of MIT's (JAM) fun annual event. While you're enjoying sushi, hot soup, and Mitarashi-dango (Japanese dessert made by mochi), you can play Whac-A-Mole-Dog, Chopstick Rubber Band Gun, and more! This event is open to the general public, admission is free, but offerings are given in exchange for tickets. Tickets are $1 each, food, drink and other activities will range between 1 and 5 tickets. Seats are limited, so come early!


Date: Friday, April 13th
Time: 7pm - 9pm
Location: MIT Ashdown House, Hulsizer Room
Map: http://whereis.mit.edu/?mapterms=NW35&mapsearch=go
item.name: Japanese Ohanami Party (Cherry Blossom Festival) at MIT
